dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: globalInference
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores information about the area used to infer characteristics of plants which are common in size.

attribute.attDefinition: Database assigned value to each unique record in the globalInference table.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the plotObservation table.

attribute.attDefinition: This is the inference area used to characterize the plants of the same dimensions. These dimensions are defined in the inferenceClassIndex table and may be characterized be either height or diameter.
